update account
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
locked = #{locked,jdbcType=BIT},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
locked_time = #{lockedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enabled_time = #{enabledTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update account set account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locked_time = #{lockedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled_time = #{enabledTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
